author: szetszwo
msg: HDFS-2427. Change the default permission in webhdfs to 755 and add range check/validation for all parameters.

author: scottbw
msg: Lots of improvements to the Butterfly widget including: better mobile experience using media queries viewport tag, nicer colour palette buttons, custom crayon pointer, widget resizes nicely to fill larger screens (e.g. mobile in portrait mode) with larger buttons for easier touch control. Tested on Safari, Chrome, Opera, FF, Opera Mobile. Doesn't yet work on Android Browser (but then it didn't before, either)

author: scottbw
msg: Replaced background image with one that scales more nicely on portrait-orientation screens, and added CC license file for it.

author: lahiru
msg: Applying the patch (AIRAVATA-153-patch-ver1.diff) for the issue AIRAVATA-153
